channel.title: First Baptist Church Of Sutherland Springs, Texas
channel.description: Heavenly inspired messages at First Baptist Church, Sutherland Springs, Texas. Please contact us to let us know if you listen to this podcast. We would also like to hear from you if this Podcast was instrumental in your accepting Christ as your Lord and Savior.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012 First Baptist Church of Sutherland Springs, Texas
